text: How to get "under the hood" information of technologies / Programming languages?
Usually, I will start learning how to use a technology/language like a web development framework from books.
When I acquire intermediate knowledge in the technology I start thinking of "How did they implement this or that?
Sometimes it seems that some knowledge is available for privileged people.
So, my question, how do you get such information (advanced stuff)?
Is there a secret to it?
By the way, I have about  1.5 years of experience only.
